title: Uefa Best European Player Ceremony
description:
53 reporters from different media and countries have decided that Leo Messi was the best player in UEFA club competitions last year, and he thus becomes the first ever winner of the award. The announcement was made shortly after the Champions League draw, with the winner pipping team mate Xavi HernÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡ndez and Cristiano Ronaldo of Real Madrid to the honour. Iniesta and PiquÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© came fourth and ninth respectively.
